description: The AWS::GameLift::GameSessionQueue resource creates an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) game session queue.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

GameSessionQueueDestination.description: A fleet or alias designated in a game session queue.

DestinationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:/-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

GameSessionQueueDestination.markdownDescription:
A fleet or alias designated in a game session queue.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

PlayerLatencyPolicy.description: Sets a latency cap for individual players when placing a game session.

MaximumIndividualPlayerLatencyMillisecon.description: The maximum latency value that is allowed for any player, in milliseconds. All policies must have a value set for this property.
MaximumIndividualPlayerLatencyMillisecon.markdownDescription:
The maximum latency value that is allowed for any player, in milliseconds. All policies must have a value set for this property.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

PolicyDurationSeconds.description: The length of time, in seconds, that the policy is enforced while placing a new game session.
PolicyDurationSeconds.markdownDescription:
The length of time, in seconds, that the policy is enforced while placing a new game session.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

PlayerLatencyPolicy.markdownDescription:
Sets a latency cap for individual players when placing a game session.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowedLocations.description: A list of locations to allow game session placement in, in the form of AWS Region codes such as us-west-2.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-z]+(-([a-z]+|\d))*  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowedLocations.markdownDescription:
A list of locations to allow game session placement in, in the form of AWS Region codes such as us-west-2.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationOrder.description: The prioritization order to use for fleet locations, when the PriorityOrder property includes LOCATION.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9\-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationOrder.markdownDescription:
The prioritization order to use for fleet locations, when the PriorityOrder property includes LOCATION.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

PriorityOrder.description: The recommended sequence to use when prioritizing where to place new game sessions.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LATENCY | COST | DESTINATION | LOCATION  
Update requires: No interruption

PriorityOrder.markdownDescription:
The recommended sequence to use when prioritizing where to place new game sessions.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

PriorityConfiguration.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A descriptive label that is associated with game session queue. Queue names must be unique within each Region.
Name.markdownDescription:
A descriptive label that is associated with game session queue. Queue names must be unique within each Region.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9-]+  
Update requires: Replacement

TimeoutInSeconds.description: The maximum time, in seconds, that a new game session placement request remains in the queue.
TimeoutInSeconds.markdownDescription:
The maximum time, in seconds, that a new game session placement request remains in the queue.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Destinations.description: A list of fleets and/or fleet aliases that can be used to fulfill game session placement requests in the queue.
Destinations.markdownDescription:
A list of fleets and/or fleet aliases that can be used to fulfill game session placement requests in the queue.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

PlayerLatencyPolicies.description: A set of policies that act as a sliding cap on player latency.
PlayerLatencyPolicies.markdownDescription:
A set of policies that act as a sliding cap on player latency.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CustomEventData.description: Information that is added to all events that are related to this game session queue.
CustomEventData.markdownDescription:
Information that is added to all events that are related to this game session queue.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [\s\S]*  
Update requires: No interruption

NotificationTarget.description: An SNS topic ARN that is set up to receive game session placement notifications.
NotificationTarget.markdownDescription:
An SNS topic ARN that is set up to receive game session placement notifications.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 300  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]*(\.fifo)?  
Update requires: No interruption

FilterConfiguration.description: A list of locations where a queue is allowed to place new game sessions.
FilterConfiguration.markdownDescription:
A list of locations where a queue is allowed to place new game sessions.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

PriorityConfiguration.description: Custom settings to use when prioritizing destinations and locations for game session placements.
PriorityConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Custom settings to use when prioritizing destinations and locations for game session placements.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift game session queue resource and uniquely identifies it.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift game session queue resource and uniquely identifies it.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:.*:gamesessionqueue\/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+  
Update requires: No interruption
